snippet: The police called the boy’s death a homicide and said he appeared to have been assaulted.
abstract: Amityville, NY, police find 4-year-old Adonis Reed unresponsive in his home, with no adults present, after responding to call requesting ambulance; child later died, and police have declared death a homicide, although details about who might have killed him remain elusive.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and TIM STELLOH
byline.contributor: Alain Delaquérière and Wendy Ruderman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The police called the boy’s death a homicide and said he appeared to have been assaulted.

headline.seo: Long Island Boy’s Death Is Labeled Homicide
headline.main: Officers Called to L.I. Home Find Dying Boy and No Adult
headline.print_headline: Officers Called to L.I. Home Find Dying Boy and No Adult
